title: How can small businesses survive the 2020s? - Quora

response.answer_text: Frankly, this cannot be told in just a quora answer. Even if someone tries, it will be incomplete information, and that can be disastrous to the business owner. If you are serious about doing business and have good profit, you must find someone experienced enough to guide you through this uncertain year. And if you feel that I will be able to guide you, contact me for free consultation.
